title: Philippe Édouard Léon Van Tieghem
summary: Philippe Édouard Léon Van Tieghem (French pronunciation: ​[filip edwaʁ leɔ̃ van tiɡɛm]; 19 April 1839 – 28 April 1914) was a French botanist born in Baillleul in the département of Nord. He was one of the best known French botanists of the latter nineteenth century.
